about_the_game:
Workshop Simulator VR is a simulation game where you take on the role of a workshop owner, equipped with a range of specialized tools. Become a master of restoring various items, take on increasingly complex tasks, earn money, build your reputation, buy new tools, replenish resources, and expand your workshop.

🔧 Disassemble & Assemble:

Use a special arm, manual, and mechanical tools to unscrew and screw bolts, remove and hammer nails, and take apart the most intricate structures. Reassemble items to restore them to their original glory.

🧼 Cleaning:

Carefully wash all surfaces with a special cleaning solution, sponge, or pressure washer. Then, clean and polish every crevice of each item with a wire brush, grinder, or sandblaster. Your earnings and reputation depend entirely on the quality of your work.

🎨 Make it beautiful:

Use brushes, colorful sprays, or an airbrush. Unleash your creativity by choosing colors and techniques to breathe new life into every item, transforming it into a unique piece of art.

Key features:

  • Play as the owner of the Workshop

  • Variety of tools and workshop techniques

  • Diverse tasks to complete

  • Interactive, physics-based objects

  • Expand and develop your workshop

Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: CPU: Intel i5-4590 equivalent or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR
